title: please fix the god dam client
body:
I am very much over this one. i had no problems with last one.
they whole joining a game but cant click yes or no.
so have to force shut down client 

get back in to join a game oh hello 5min dodging q fuken timer in rank.

thats not my fault its the 7th time its happen this month. its happen in rank. normal draft and aram.

spent some that hard earn money i spent on this game to fix it asap!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
